content:
As we were preparing for our first performance as "The Starlight Serenaders," I, Mia, suggested that we should think about what the topic of our first song should be. After some discussion, we decided to write a song about the importance of following your dreams and never giving up.

The title of the song was "Shine On." The lyrics of the song were about how everyone has the potential to shine, but sometimes we need to push through the hard times and keep going. We wrote about how chasing your dreams is not always easy, but it's worth it in the end. The song was meant to be an anthem of encouragement, to remind people to keep going and never give up on their aspirations.

Here's an example of the lyrics of the song:

Verse 1:
Feels like the world is against me
Can't find my way out of the dark
But I know I'm meant to shine
I'll find my way to make my mark

Chorus:
Shine on, shine on
Let your light shine bright
Shine on, shine on
It's your time to ignite

Verse 2:
Gotta keep on fighting
Gotta keep on trying
Don't let the shadows bring you down
Keep reaching for the sky

Chorus:
Shine on, shine on
Let your light shine bright
Shine on, shine on
It's your time to ignite

Bridge:
We all got a fire inside
Let it burn, let it shine
We all got a story to tell
So go on and make it shine

Chorus:
Shine on, shine on
Let your light shine bright
Shine on, shine on
It's your time to ignite

Outro:
Keep on shining, keep on climbing
You'll find your way, just keep on shining.

This song became our anthem and we sang it on every performance as a reminder to ourselves and to our audience to chase their dreams and never give up on them.
